name: Vinay P. Namboodiri
content: Vinay P. Namboodiri I am currently a faculty member in the Department of Computer Science in the University of Bath. Previously I have worked at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Kanpur, Bell Labs Antwerp, been a Postdoctoral Fellow in KU Leuven with Prof. Luc Van Gool and obtained a Ph.D. while being guided by Prof. Subhasis Chaudhuri. I am interested in research in Computer Vision and Machine Learning. I am specifically interested in the following areas of research: Multi-modal Human Centered AI Generative AI Beyond Supervised Learning Vinay P.
